article.headline: Xavier 74, Fordham 52
article.story: CINCINNATI (AP) -- Lionel Chalmers scored 23 points on 7-of-11 3-point shooting to lead Xavier to a 74-52 win over Fordham on Saturday. Chalmers hit five 3s in nine minutes to fuel a 26-7 run that gave the Musketeers (12-9, 3-5 Atlantic 10) a 28-9 lead with about seven minutes left in the first half. Xavier led 40-20 at halftime. The Rams (4-15, 1-7) lost their sixth straight and have dropped 21 of 22 conference games. The Musketeers outrebounded the Rams 50-31, but Fordham's Ya'akosi Mushon pulled down a game-high 13 boards. Michael Haynes led Fordham with 19 points. Xavier's Romain Sato had 11 rebounds, and he and Anthony Myles each scored 16 points. Xavier shot 10-of-24 from 3-point range, compared to 3-of-19 for Fordham.
